benchmark_details.name: PEM-Rel-8K
benchmark_details.overview: PEM-Rel-8K is a multi-disciplinary benchmark including over 8,000 relationships drawn from three widely used ontologies: IEEE, PhySH, and MeSH, evaluated for identifying semantic relationships among research topics.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate model performance in identifying semantic relations between research topics across multiple academic domains.

data.source: PEM-Rel-8K dataset constructed from IEEE, PhySH, and MeSH taxonomies.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the model's classification performance on test datasets.
methodology.interpretation: High F1 scores indicate effective identification of semantic relationships, while lower scores suggest misclassifications.
methodology.validation: Models were validated across training and test sets, examining performance consistency.
